languages.text: {n}Очевидно, за напускным смятением скрывается попытка отвести от себя подозрение. Однако вы узнаете в стоящем подле камердинера служку, что ранее преподнес вам дар. И все встает на свои места.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Очевидно, за напускным смятением скрывается попытка отвести от себя подозрение. Однако вы узнаете в стоящем подле камердинера служку, что ранее преподнес вам дар. И все встает на свои места.{/n}
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: {n}The feigned confusion is an obvious attempt to draw suspicion away from herself, but you recognise the valet standing beside her as the same servant who delivered your gift. And everything falls into place.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Очевидно, за напускным смятением скрывается попытка отвести от себя подозрение. Однако вы узнаете в стоящем подле камердинера служку, что ранее преподнес вам дар. И все встает на свои места.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The feigned confusion is an obvious attempt to draw suspicion away from herself, but you recognise the valet standing beside her as the same servant who delivered your gift. And everything falls into place.{/n}
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}The feigned confusion is an obvious attempt to draw suspicion away from herself, but you recognise the valet standing beside her as the same servant who delivered your gift. And everything falls into place.{/n}
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}The feigned confusion is an obvious attempt to draw suspicion away from herself, but you recognise the valet standing beside her as the same servant who delivered your gift. And everything falls into place.{/n}
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}The feigned confusion is an obvious attempt to draw suspicion away from herself, but you recognise the valet standing beside her as the same servant who delivered your gift. And everything falls into place.{/n}
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Su afectada confusión es un obvio intento por alejar las sospechas de sí misma, pero reconoces al sirviente que tiene a su lado: es la persona que te entregó el regalo. Y entonces todas las piezas encajan.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The feigned confusion is an obvious attempt to draw suspicion away from herself, but you recognise the valet standing beside her as the same servant who delivered your gift. And everything falls into place.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Su afectada confusión es un obvio intento por alejar las sospechas de sí misma, pero reconoces al sirviente que tiene a su lado: es la persona que te entregó el regalo. Y entonces todas las piezas encajan.{/n}
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: {n}戸惑うそぶりを見せて自分は関係ないと装うとしているのは明らかだが、贈り物を届けた付き人と同じ人物が彼女の横に立っているのに気づいた。そして、何もかも合点がいった。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The feigned confusion is an obvious attempt to draw suspicion away from herself, but you recognise the valet standing beside her as the same servant who delivered your gift. And everything falls into place.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}戸惑うそぶりを見せて自分は関係ないと装うとしているのは明らかだが、贈り物を届けた付き人と同じ人物が彼女の横に立っているのに気づいた。そして、何もかも合点がいった。{/n}
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: {n}很显然，卡西娅故作困惑的举动是为了打消你对她的怀疑，但你却认出来，站在她身边的仆人就是送来礼物的那个人。真相显而易见。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The feigned confusion is an obvious attempt to draw suspicion away from herself, but you recognise the valet standing beside her as the same servant who delivered your gift. And everything falls into place.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}很显然，卡西娅故作困惑的举动是为了打消你对她的怀疑，但你却认出来，站在她身边的仆人就是送来礼物的那个人。真相显而易见。{/n}
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Elle feint manifestement la confusion pour détourner les soupçons, mais le valet qui se tient à ses côtés n'est autre que celui qui vous a apporté le cadeau. Soudain, tout s'éclaircit.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The feigned confusion is an obvious attempt to draw suspicion away from herself, but you recognise the valet standing beside her as the same servant who delivered your gift. And everything falls into place.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Elle feint manifestement la confusion pour détourner les soupçons, mais le valet qui se tient à ses côtés n'est autre que celui qui vous a apporté le cadeau. Soudain, tout s'éclaircit.{/n}
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Die gespielte Verwirrung ist ein offensichtlicher Versuch, den Verdacht von sich abzulenken. Du erkennst jedoch den Diener neben ihr als denselben, der dein Geschenk abgeliefert hat. Und plötzlich wird dir alles klar.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The feigned confusion is an obvious attempt to draw suspicion away from herself, but you recognise the valet standing beside her as the same servant who delivered your gift. And everything falls into place.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Die gespielte Verwirrung ist ein offensichtlicher Versuch, den Verdacht von sich abzulenken. Du erkennst jedoch den Diener neben ihr als denselben, der dein Geschenk abgeliefert hat. Und plötzlich wird dir alles klar.{/n}
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Cassia, şaşırmış rolü yaparak bariz bir şekilde ondan şüphelenmemen için uğraşıyor. Buna rağmen Cassia'nın yanında duran uşağın sana hediyeyi teslim eden hizmetkâr olduğunu fark ediyorsun. Tüm taşlar yerine oturuyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The feigned confusion is an obvious attempt to draw suspicion away from herself, but you recognise the valet standing beside her as the same servant who delivered your gift. And everything falls into place.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Cassia şaşkın rolü yaparak bariz bir şekilde ondan şüphelenmemeni sağlamaya çalışıyor. Buna rağmen Cassia'nın yanında duran uşağın sana hediyeyi teslim eden hizmetkâr olduğunu fark ediyorsun. Tüm taşlar yerine oturuyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion
